title: Nasus Reklaw & the Never Ending Orange Grove
description: Susan Walker is a fiery, ill-ï»¿mannered, 12 year old girl, whose life is turned upside down...LITERALLY!When her mother sends her halfway across the globe to her Grandpa's little orange grove, Susan discovers that there is more to this little grove than meets the eye. Now she must journey across unknown lands and face an unimagineable foe before the light on earth is destroyed forever
author: R.W.  Harris
